messages.subject: New York, Connecticut, western Massachusetts
messages.msgSnippet: I got TWO local announcements this morning, and they re not appropriate for this list, but I still put them in a public place, here:
messages.messageBody:
I got TWO local announcements this morning, and they're not
appropriate for this list, but I still put them in a public place, here:

http://unschooling.blogspot.com/2009/06/new-york-and-connecticut.html

Please keep an eye out for a good, simple message board for such
announcements, which I could host on my site. If this list devolved
into local announcements instead of remaining a discussion of the
principles behind unschooling, it would be of much less value.

It takes time for me to reject notices of local interest. Could each
person who reads this try to remember to consider what lists you're
sending announcements to, and NOT send regional topics here?

Sandra
